query: INSERT INTO tenant_users (tenantId, userId, role, createdAt, updatedAt) SELECT 1, id, 'admin', NOW(), NOW() FROM users WHERE email = 'admin@erpfinanceiro.com' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tenant_users WHERE userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'admin@erpfinanceiro.com'));
